titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit a Federal firearms licensee from selling or delivering a firearm or ammunition to an intoxicated person.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 2/10/1994--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit the sale or delivery of a firearm or ammunition to an intoxicated person.
